name: Gambled Away
description:
This is a prototype of what I hope to be a roguelike deckbuilder using dice sets that have crazy effects and combos. This is all I could get done for the game jam but there are so many background systems running here that I hope to use for more later on. Functionality is a little buggy still, just don't end your turn after loading your dice without rolling them. Thanks for playing.

How to Play: On your turn you have 3 actions that can be used to load or set dice.  When you set a dice that has the “Set” tag, it cannot be rolled. Loaded dice will be rolled after pressing roll. You may only roll once per turn. Dice are tagged with a die type of defense or attack and will add to the corresponding total after rolled. If your opponent knocks your die around, it will change your totals.
